title: Poster, "Power--The Nerve Center of London's Underground", 1930
signed: Imprinted in black ink, lower right: EMcKnightKauffer 1930
inscribed: Imprinted in lower right:17.1500.1/3 and VINCENT BROOKS, DAY & SON, LTD. LITH. LONSON. WC.2.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: At center, a spinning black wheel from which extends a black arm with clenched hand. Lightning bolts issue from the fist. At upper right, a red power plant. Imprinted in red, blue, and black, left margin and lower left portion: POWER / THE / NERVE CENTER / OF LONDON'S / UNDERGROUND.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Power--The Nerve Center of London's Underground", 1930.
1930. Lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-45.
